Verses: 1 (thaaveedhu Than Kumaaran Apsalomukkuth Thappi Odippogaiyil Paadina Sangeedham.) Karththaave, En Saththurukkal Evvalavaaip Perugiyirukkiraargal! Enakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbugiravargal Anegar.
2 dhevanidaththil Avanukku Ratchippu Illaiyendru, En Aaththumaavaik Kuriththu Sollugiravargal Anegaraayirukkiraargal. (selaa.)
3 aanaalum Karththaave, Neer En Kedagamum, En Magimaiyum, En Thalaiyai Uyarththugiravarumaayirukkireer.
4 naan Karththarai Nokki Saththamittuk Kooppitten; Avar Thamadhu Parisuththa Parvadhaththilirundhu Enakku Sevikoduththaar. (selaa.)
5 naan Paduththu Niththirai Seydhen; Vizhiththukkonden; Karththar Ennaith Thaangugiraar.
6 enakku Virodhamaaga Sutrilum Padaiyeduththu Varugira Padhinaayiramperukkum Naan Bayappaden.
7 karththaave, Ezhundharulum; En Dhevane, Ennai Ratchiyum. Neer En Pagaignar Ellaaraiyum Thaadaiyile Adiththu, Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Parkalaith Thagarththuppotteer.
8 iratchippu Karththarudaiyadhu; Dhevareerudaiya Aaseervaadham Ummudaiya Janaththinmel Iruppadhaaga. (selaa.)
